explains: v. 探讨，探究；考察，探索；（用手或身体其他部位）探查，仔细检查

sentences.en: We will explore every avenue until we find an answer.
sentences.cn: 我们要探索一切途径，直到找到答案为止。

sentences.en: I want to explore and get in touch with my inner self.
sentences.cn: 我想认真探索，了解我内在的个性。

sentences.en: I just wanted to explore on my own.
sentences.cn: 我只是想独自考察一下。
